job.title: Software Engineer / Node / 100% Remote
job.description:
We are Actively seeking a Software Engineer/Node to join our team on a permanent basis. In this position you will work on SCRUM team that is creating APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architecture. We offer 100% remote work, 100% paid health care, 401K with Match, Bonus, and an excellent opportunity for advancement.

 

Desired Skills

 

  • 3+ years of Software Engineering experience
  • Proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript running on Node.js
  • Ability to create APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architecture
  • Strong experience with SQL, MySQL or NoSQL database design and implementation?
  • Strong understanding of building and using REST APIs
  • Interest in moving into API architecture and design
  • Experience working in an agile development environment with remote team members
